short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shortcut 'diff' search on Google for 'What is the difference between ... and ...'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do not write "What is the difference between [X] and [Y]" on Google.

Just type 'diff' on address bar, then type your comparisons like: 
coffee and tea

This extension will transfer you to google search page.
